div.p: Color deformation effects of the three oils of M. officinalis cultivated in France, Ireland, and Serbia against American house dust mites and European house dust mite. ( a) untreated mites, ( b) mites, treated with M. officinalis oil (France), ( c) mites, treated with M. officinalis oil (Ireland), ( d) mites, treated with M. officinalis oil (Serbia) (100Ã—), and ( e) mites, treated with M. officinalis oil (France) (naked eye).
